seo.title: Tina Cloud
seo.description: Tina is a content management platform, with a content management API and frontend toolkit to rapidly prototype your own CMS.

blocks.headline: Ship Great Content, Faster
blocks.subline: Tina Cloud is a Headless CMS Backed by Git

items.headline: Collaborate With the Team
items.subline: Onboard your team; no GitHub accounts required.  Tina Cloud brings user-management, auth, roles, and a Content API.

items.headline: Move Faster With Tina Cloud
items.subline: Visual editing + Git storage allows you to ship content faster with the safety of version-control

items.headline: GraphQL API
items.subline: The Tina Content API provides a GraphQL interface to your repositories files where content is stored in open formats like Markdown and JSON, allowing for easy content re-use and migrations.

items.headline: Robust Content Models
items.subline: Tina promotes a document-oriented approach to content models. This means repeatable or nested structures like blocks can be stored with the pageâ€™s complete data, resulting in more straightforward content queries and operations.

items.headline: Approve Content Before it Goes Live
items.subline: Content approval workflows come baked into Tina. Concepts from Git are made intuitive for the whole team.

browser.headline: The Tina Platform
browser.subline: Connect Tina's open-source editor to any backend. Tina Cloud strives to be the best solution without locking you in.

items.headline: Headless CMSs
items.subline: Connect to a headless CMS for a better content editing experience

items.headline: Git Repo
items.subline: Connect to the GitHub API with the Tina GitHub plugin

items.headline: Tina Cloud
items.subline: API and that is backed by Git
